select m.*, r.name as road_name, p.name as parking_name, p.status as parking_status from magnetometer as m, parking as p, road as r
m.parking_id = p.id and p.road_id = r.id
and m.name like concat('%', #{magnetometerName}, '%')
and r.name like concat('%', #{roadName}, '%')
limit #{skipRow}, #{pageSize}

select count(0) from magnetometer as m, parking as p, road as r
m.parking_id = p.id and p.road_id = r.id
and m.name like concat('%', #{magnetometerName}, '%')
and r.name like concat('%', #{roadName}, '%')

select *from magnetometer
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
